content:
In my career, I’ve gained experience in data engineering, analysis, and PowerBI dashboarding. I’m always eager to find the best solutions to any challenge. When I’m not working on projects, I love traveling and diving.
This page is divided into two sections: the projects section - where you’ll find summaries of the projects I worked on, and the posts section - where I deep-dive into more technical topics (thing’s I learned, code examples etc.).
Download my resumé .
summary: In my career, I’ve gained experience in data engineering, analysis, and PowerBI dashboarding. I’m always eager to find the best solutions to any challenge. When I’m not working on projects, I love traveling and diving.
title: Rok Jankovic

summary: In this project we will download real estate data from a Slovenian page store the results in GBQ and visualize them with LookerBI.
title: An autonomous web crawler
